entry.title: The Road to DC collection
entry.summary:
Author: Erisedwrites

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 913Chapters: 3/100Kudos: 2

Summary: This is a collection of Drabbles, One shots and what-ifs of DC Comics heroes, My goal is to add this to my portfolio so I can one day write for DC.
